import React, { Fragment, Component } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { Link, browserHistory } from 'react-router' import Card from 'shared/card' import Button from 'shared/button' import RegisteredRFC from './rfc' import EditClientRFC from './rfc/editingForm' import PaymentAccounts from './paymentAccounts' import NewPaymentAccount from './paymentAccounts/editingForm' import ClientsTable from './clients' import EditClientInfo from './clients/editingForm' import EmployeesTable from './employees' import EditEmployee from './employees/editingForm' import BranchesTable from './branches' import EditClientBranch from './branches/editingForm' import NewBank from './synchronization' import SelectBank from './synchronization/selectBank' import SmartSync from './synchronization/smart-sync' import SynchronizationFinished from './synchronization/synchronizationFinished' import EditSyncAccounts from './synchronization/editSyncAccounts' import UpdateToken from './synchronization/updateToken' import SessionStore from 'stores/session' import EditClientActions from 'actions/editClient' import PaymentAccountsActions from 'actions/paymentAccounts' function getCurrentState () { return { checkFeature: SessionStore.getFeatures() } } class EditClient extends Component { state = { ...getCurrentState() } componentDidMount () { SessionStore.addChangeListener(this._onChange) } componentWillUnmount () { SessionStore.removeChangeListener(this._onChange) } _onChange = () => { this.setState(getCurrentState()) } render () { const { checkFeature } = this.state const hasSynchronization = checkFeature.find( feature => feature.key === 'synchronization' ) let content = null let button = null switch (this.props.route.tab) { case 'entidades': switch (this.props.route.content) { case 'list': content = break case 'edit': content = break } break case 'sucursales': switch (this.props.route.content) { case 'list': content = button = ( ) break case 'edit': content = break } break case 'cuentas-de-pago': switch (this.props.route.content) { case 'list': content = button = ( {hasSynchronization && ( )} ) break case 'edit': content = break case 'smartSync': content = break case 'editSecond': content = break case 'continue': content = break case 'finished': content = break case 'edit-sync-accounts': content = break case 'update-token': content = break } break case 'clientes': switch (this.props.route.content) { case 'list': content = ( ) button = ( ) break case 'edit': content = break } break case 'empleados': switch (this.props.route.content) { case 'list': content = button = ( ) break case 'edit': content = break } break case 'proveedores': switch (this.props.route.content) { case 'list': content = ( ) button = ( ) break case 'edit': content = break } break } return (

Mi Empresa

{button}
{content}
) } } EditClient.propTypes = { route: PropTypes.shape({ tab: PropTypes.number, content: PropTypes.element }) } export default EditClient
